claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

extracted_evidence.quote: acell culture based influenza vaccine (Flucelvax Quadrivalent by Seqirus, Inc., ccIIV4) and a recombinant influenza vaccine (Flublok Quadrivalent by Sanofi Pasteur, RIV4). RIV4 contains 3 times the i d 45 HA/d / ...d
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that Flublok Quadrivalent (RIV4) contains 3 times the amount of HA, specifically 45 micrograms per dose per strain, compared to standard-dose vaccines, directly supporting the claim about the HA content.

extracted_evidence.quote: IIV4 and ccIIV4 (15 µg HA/dose/strain). For A (H3 N2), RIV4 vaccination not only improved the quality of the functional neutralizing antibody
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote clearly states that the standard-dose influenza vaccines (IIV4 and ccIIV4) contain 15 micrograms of HA per dose per strain, which is the comparator for Flublok's higher HA content, directly supporting the claim.
